If 1 or more "Franknstech" cards were discarded this way, Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower non-Effect Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot activate the effects of monsters, except Fiend monsters. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) If a face-up non-Effect Fusion Monster(s) you control would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your GY, instead. You can only use each effect of "Franknstech Grislyglass" once per turn.
1100469.name: Franknstech Grislyglass

1097537.effect: If you control a "Franknstech" Ritual Monster: Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower non-Effect Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot activate the effects of monsters, except Fiend monsters. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) If a "Franknstech" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use 1 "Franknstech Vilevial" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1097537.name: Franknstech Vilevial

1097621.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Fiend monsters or non-Effect Monsters. When this card is activated: You can send 1 "Franknstech" card from your Deck to your GY. While you control a non-Effect Fusion Monster, "Franknstech" cards you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's monster effects. You can only activate 1 "Dr. Franknstech's Laboratory" per turn.
1097621.name: Dr. Franknstech's Laboratory

1097737.effect:
2 monsters, including a non-Effect Monster OR a Ritual Monster
Cannot be used as Link Material. If this card is Link Summoned: Set 1 "Franknstech Cursecall" directly from your Deck. If a non-Effect Fusion Monster is Summoned to a zone this card points to: Double that monster's ATK until your opponent's End Phase, and if you do, draw 1 card, but that monster cannot attack directly this turn. You can only use each effect of "Franknstech Haemostat" once per turn.
1097737.name: Franknstech Haemostat
